morning:
Yeshara and shenara had to go on 2 planes from Australia to Thailand and Thailand to Vietnam.
for the whole the morning we on planes sleeping.
evening: Want to sleep now. Long day
title: Arrival Day
afternoon: When we finally landed in Ho Chi Minh City we were originally going to use an app called grab that gives us easy access to a driver that will take us to the places we need to be but, a small business stand in the airport offered to take us to our hotel (New World Saigon Hotel HCMC) $25 AUD in 30 minutes .Its actually wasn't far but since there was so much traffic as usual with all the many motorbikes  it took 30 minutes.
